application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
TPO TREES
T2 - Silver Maple - reduce to previous points of reduction (2m approx. branch length removal)
T3 - Sorbus - Reduce to previous points of reduction (2m approx. branch removal)
T4 - Robinia - Reduce/pollard crown by approx. 1m beyond previous points of reduction due to the presence of a bracket fungus at the base of the tree.
The reason for the above pruning is general and routine maintenance
NON TPO TREES
T1 - Sycamore - reduce to previous points of reduction (1m approx. branch length removal)
T5 Japanese Privet - reduce to previous points of reduction (2m approx. branch removal)
T6 - Norway Maple - reduce to previous points of reduction (2m approx. branch removal)
T7 - Fig - reduce to previous points of reduction (2m approx. branch removal)
T9- Cypress - reduce height to previous points (2m branch removal), trim side growth
